author: sayury
root_title: Avoiding death / Esquivando la muerte [Eng - Spa]
body:
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmPMMCGoj9ADyeswkpPjmwnEgqtK6RK1zSpi1RMptgNDr3/inshot_20231129_005122845.jpg)


**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
He arrived different from that excursion to the mountain where he had saved - accidentally - a goblin and who, in gratitude, granted him the power to see a scene - just one - of his future. He told him that he would show him the passage where his life was in danger... and he would take care of the rest. He had to wait until the moon was in its last quarter... "How strange, he had commented, and why not a full moon and the goblin almost glared at him and that goblin is goblin and lycanthrope is lycanthrope and he did not insist so as not to bother him and the thing was left for the waning quarter that it was a annoying because he had to wait fifteen days" Under the cedar tree in the backyard of his house he performed the ritual. The goblin told him that his question had to be very specific so as not to lead to confusion and ambiguity. "...and I want to see in detail the nearest time in the future - date included - when I will be in danger of death..." A veil was lifted in his mind and on what appeared to be an old piece of leather covered in dust, the date immediately wrote down began to form as if by pyrotechnics: December 7, 2023. Then the scene changed... He saw himself, dressed in his work uniform, waiting in front of the building where the Modern Pharmacy operated for the right moment to cross the avenue. The traffic light changed the light. The cars stopped and he crossed. Just at that moment, a truck that was coming at full speed, out of control and without brakes, hit him. The image was completely erased. He did not see the collision. "Surely because he had not said death" - he thought - "but danger of death." How easy it would be to avoid it! That day he would just have to wait for the truck to pass and only then cross the street. If he had been able to see a few more seconds he would have noticed how in a long jump back, driven by adrenaline, he managed to avoid the vehicle and continued forward only with fright. The indicated date arrived and he stayed next to the Pharmacy waiting for the truck to pass so he could cross later. He saw the truck approaching at full speed and thought: "How easy it is to dodge!" The truck approached and just at the moment he had to cross, after the traffic light had changed, just at the moment when he should no longer be on the sidewalk, a clay pot with a plant and a beautiful red rose was lying there. in one of the windows on the 5th floor, being accidentally tripped over by the lady in charge of cleaning, it fell into the void, falling on his head and causing his death instantly due to a fractured skull.
‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§‚ô©https://images.ecency.com//a_separador_sayurDQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJy.png‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§

Versi√≥n en castellano

<><><> Lleg√≥ cambiado de esa excursi√≥n a la monta√±a donde hab√≠a salvado - accidentalmente - a un duende quien en agradecimiento le otorg√≥ el poder de ver una escena - una sola - de su futuro. √âl le dijo que le mostrara el pasaje donde su vida corriera peligro... y √©l se encargar√≠a de lo dem√°s. Tuvo qu√© esperar a que la luna estuviera en su cuarto menguante... "Qu√© raro, hab√≠a comentado √©l, y que por qu√© no luna llena y el duende casi le fulmina con la mirada y que duende es duende y lic√°ntropo es lic√°ntropo y √©l no insisti√≥ para no molestarlo y qued√≥ la cosa para cuarto menguante que era un fastidio porque deb√≠a esperar quince d√≠as" Debajo del cedro del patio trasero de su casa realiz√≥ el ritual. El duende le dijo que su pregunta deb√≠a ser muy espec√≠fica para no dar lugar a confusiones y ambig√ºedades. "...y quiero ver en detalle el momento m√°s cercano en el futuro - fecha incluida - en que estar√© en peligro de muerte..." En su mente se descorri√≥ un velo y en lo que aparentaba ser un viejo cuero lleno de polvo se fue formando como por pirotecnia la fecha que anot√≥ de inmediato: 7 diciembre 2023 Luego la escena cambi√≥... Se vio a s√≠ mismo, enfundado en su uniforme de trabajo, esperando frente al edificio donde funcionaba la Farmacia Moderna el momento adecuado para cruzar la avenida. El sem√°foro cambi√≥ la luz. Se detuvieron los autos y √©l cruz√≥. Justo en ese momento, un cami√≥n que ven√≠a a toda velocidad, descontrolado y sin frenos lo embisti√≥. La imagen se borr√≥ totalmente. No lleg√≥ a ver el arrollamiento. "De seguro porque no hab√≠a dicho muerte" - pens√≥ - "sino peligro de muerte". ¬°Qu√© f√°cil ser√≠a esquivarla! Ese d√≠a s√≥lo tendr√≠a que esperar a que pasara el cami√≥n y s√≥lo despu√©s cruzar la calle. Si hubiera podido ver unos segundos m√°s habr√≠a percibido c√≥mo en un largo salto atr√°s, impulsado por la adrenalina, lograba esquivar el veh√≠culo y segu√≠a adelante s√≥lo con el susto. Lleg√≥ la fecha indicada y se qued√≥ junto a la Farmacia esperando que pasara el cami√≥n para √©l cruzar despu√©s. Visualiz√≥ el cami√≥n acerc√°ndose a toda velocidad y pens√≥: "¬°Qu√© f√°cil es esquivarlo!" Se acerc√≥ el cami√≥n y justo en el momento que √©l deb√≠a cruzar, despu√©s del cambio de luz del sem√°foro, justo en el momento en que ya no deb√≠a estar en la acera, una maceta de barro con una planta y una hermos√≠sima rosa roja que estaba en una de las ventanas del 5¬∞ piso, siendo tropezadoa accidentalmente por la se√±ora encargada de la limpieza se desprendi√≥ al vac√≠o cayendo sobre su cabeza y caus√°ndole la muerte instant√°neamente por fractura de cr√°neo.
‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§‚ô©https://images.ecency.com/DQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJ/a_separador_sayury.png‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§


Thank you for reading this far. >Gracias por llegar leyendo hasta ac√°.

author: lunafrances
root_title: The Star of Mat√≠as (Tale)  / El Lucero de Mat√≠as (Cuento) [Eng - Spa]
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmXdCuqVyrhfv17HUMU86Thw344au9FeCbPbAW7SYuUYU6/img_20231115_wa0059.jpg


**(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)**
Mrs. Luna eagerly asked her daughter to give her a little grandson, to spoil him, take him to the park and make him delicious treats. Nelitza, she told her mother... _I can't, it's not the time, mom, I have many commitments, many responsibilities with studies and work. Mrs. Luna, with her head down, responded to her daughter‚Ä¶ _Time is passing by in excuses, you are already forty years old and if you continue like this you are going to be alone and that saddens me... What will become of you when you are old and sick? Who will make you a soup like the one you make for me? Mrs. Luna would sit in her rocking chair at six in the afternoon to wait for the first star to come out. Alone and with great melancholy, she spoke to the little star and called it Mat√≠as, telling it her sorrows. She felt that it was listening to her and smiling at her in its blinking eyes. So the days and months passed. One afternoon in December, Nelitza arrived, very upset with his husband Jos√©, he smiled and hugged her. Mrs. Luna, who was very discreet and respected the couple's privacy, limited herself to watching the scene from her rocking chair. Nelitza had to travel for a long time to another country, her trip lasted seven months. Upon returning, she and Jos√© went straight to her mother's house. They knocked on the door and, upon opening it... What a surprise for Mrs. Luna! Nelitza was carrying a baby wrapped in a blue blanket in her arms, who winked at her when she saw her grandmother. Nelitza and Jos√© Andr√©s felt happy with Mat√≠as, the blessing that came to them at an unexpected moment.
https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/hermaryrc/EnyvkDRHLBL8AxruQpFTKBz3kDSS6t93Tdhp6hcukRYgpcRutKTD3EmnDP4XD3JGoPP.png

**Versi√≥n en castellano**
https://images.ecency.com/DQmXdCuqVyrhfv17HUMU86Thw344au9FeCbPbAW7SYuUYU6/img_20231115_wa0059.jpg



La se√±ora Luna, le ped√≠a con ansias a su hija, que le diera un nietecito, para consentirlo, llevarlo al parque y hacerle deliciosas golosinas. Nelitza, le dec√≠a a su mam√°‚Ä¶ _No puedo, no es el momento mam√°, tengo muchos compromisos, muchas responsabilidades con los estudios y el trabajo. La se√±ora Luna, cabizbaja le respond√≠a a su hija‚Ä¶ _El tiempo se te va pasando en excusas, ya tienes cuarenta a√±os y si sigues as√≠ te vas a quedar solita y eso me entristece‚Ä¶ ¬øQu√© ser√° de ti cuando est√©s viejita y enferma? ¬øQui√©n te har√° una sopita como la que t√∫ me haces a m√≠? La se√±ora Luna, se sentaba en su mecedora a las seis de la tarde a esperar a que saliera el primer lucerito. Solita y con una gran melancol√≠a, le hablaba al lucerito y lo llamaba Mat√≠as, cont√°ndole sus penas. Ella sent√≠a que √©l la escuchaba y en su titilar le sonre√≠a. As√≠ pasaron los d√≠as y los meses. Una tarde del mes de diciembre, lleg√≥ Nelitza, muy disgustada con su esposo Jos√©, este sonre√≠a y la abrazaba. La se√±ora Luna, quien era muy discreta y respetaba la privacidad de la pareja, se limit√≥ a ver la escena desde su mecedora. Nelitza, tuvo que viajar por un largo tiempo a otro pa√≠s, su viaje dur√≥ siete meses. Al regresar, ella y Jos√© fueron directo a la casa de su mam√°. Tocaron la puerta y, al abrirla‚Ä¶ ¬°May√∫scula sorpresa para la se√±ora Luna! Nelitza llevaba en sus brazos envuelto en una mantita azul un beb√©, que al ver a su abuelita le gui√±o un ojito. Nelitza y Jos√© Andr√©s, se sent√≠an dichosos con Mat√≠as, la bendici√≥n que les lleg√≥ en un momento inesperado.
https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/hermaryrc/EnyvkDRHLBL8AxruQpFTKBz3kDSS6t93Tdhp6hcukRYgpcRutKTD3EmnDP4XD3JGoPP.png

author: elioe
root_title: Hive Music Festival -üé∂ Week N¬∞58 - Round 1 [ENG-SPA] "Pastor Divino" ‚õ™ (Divine Sheperd) Cover By @elioe üéÑ
body:
---
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmZJzTmoWUTBa29isgAmGujWZz6hjk8uLev6qxNxsvTTWL/inshot_20231126_062330918.jpg)


**
(Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe, puedes ver la versi√≥n en castellano al final del post)
**
Greetings, @musiczone community. Congratulations to each and everyone on the recent celebration - on November 22 - of Musician's Day. May Saint Cecilia, virgin and martyr, the Patroness of Musicians, help and accompany us in all our projects and ways.
The most beautiful time of the year is approaching: Christmas! Time to dust off the maracas and activate them, accompanying the songs in honor of the Child Jesus.
Today is the First Sunday of Advent, the joyous era of the arrival of the Child Jesus, our Divine Shepherd, whom it is our responsibility to follow, begins. Therefore, in the company of my friends from the Musical Group "Venezuelan Power" I present to you a Venezuelan Christmas Carol: "Pastor Divino" (Divine Sheperd) which begins with a call:
Follow His steps to the Divine Shepherd to the Divine Shepherd who follows His footsteps is on a good way who follows His footsteps is on the right way


This cheerful Venezuelan Christmas Carol was originally performed by the musical group "Un Solo Pueblo" (Only One People) with the lead voice of the charismatic singer Francisco Pacheco.

One of the verses we sing was written by @hermaryrc, it is the one that says:
This choir sings //with infinite force// //although our voices don't be brand new //


The friends who supported me in this participation:
@barbyjr Video recording @hermaryrc Leading voice @orlandobello Percussion @sayury Choirs, guitar, post publication
[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafkreie2yw6f74fnfxrvltwdo4lvvnuzgvb7jkza2ipurr63ojg36p42lm/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=elioe/dkmhvfox) ‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=elioe/dkmhvfox)

https://images.ecency.com/DQmYSsDs1B3wsEQw4SGKmugpbGkHroMyPYQZJsraz1m2qAk/separad_or_elioe.png

**Versi√≥n en castellano**

Saludos, comunidad de @musiczone. Felicitaciones a todos y cada uno por la reciente celebraci√≥n - el 22 de noviembre - del D√≠a del M√∫sico. Que Santa Cecilia, virgen y m√°rtir, la Patrona de los M√∫sicos, nos ayude y acompa√±e en todos nuestros proyectos y caminos.
Se acerca la √©poca m√°s bella del a√±o ¬°La Navidad! Tiempo de desempolvar las maracas y activadas acompa√±ando los cantos en honor al Ni√±o Dios.
Hoy es Primer Domingi de Adviento, comienza la alegre Eso era de la llegada del Ni√±o Jes√∫s, nuestro Pastor Divino, a quien nos corresponde seguir. Por eso, en compa√±√≠a de mis amigos de la Agrupaci√≥n Musical "Venezuelan Power" les presento un "aguinaldo de parranda": "Pastor Divino", el cual comienza con un llamado:
S√≠ganle los pasos al Pastor Divino al Pastor Divino quien sigue Sus pasos va por buen camino quien sigue quien sigue Sus pasos va por buen camino


Este alegre aguinaldo fue interpretado originalmente por la agrupaci√≥n musical "Un S√≥lo Pueblo" con la voz solista del carism√°tico Francisco Pacheco.
Si desean leer la letra de la canci√≥n, hagan clic [ac√°]( https://www.musica.com/letras.asp?letra=1911620 )

Una de las estrofas que cantamos la escribi√≥ @hermaryrc, se trata de la que dice:
Este coro canta //con fuerza infinita// //aunque nuestras voces no sean nuevecitas//

Los amigos que me brindaron su apoyo en esta participaci√≥n:
@barbyjr Grabaci√≥n del video @hermaryrc Voz l√≠der @orlandobello Percusi√≥n @sayury Coros, guitarra, publicaci√≥n del post
https://youtu.be/Hy_6UkGjf1c?si=byM7HPDAFXdCy550

Pueden ver la letra de la canci√≥n haciendo clic [ac√°]( https://www.musica.com/letras.asp?letra=1911620 )

https://images.ecency.com/DQmYSsDs1B3wsEQw4SGKmugpbGkHroMyPYQZJsraz1m2qAk/separad_or_elioe.png

I am very grateful to those who took their time to listen to me play the maracas and to those who had infinite patience to read this far. Gratitude to the organizers and wishes of success to all participants.
>Agradezco mucho a quienes apartaron de su tiempo para escucharme tocar las maracas y a quienes tuvieron paciencia infinita para llegar leyendo hasta ac√°. Gratitud hacia los organizadores y deseos de √©xito para todos los participantes.

author: orlandobello
root_title: Hive Music Festival Week 58 Round 1 "Un Gato En La Oscuridad" Cover By @orlandobello And His Drums
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmbLebycQUnYXfpcu2rwtEGiZ5TbM6FX5Lc56XgQ2hojJH/inshot_20231125_053135030.jpg

[![](https://ipfs-3speak.b-cdn.net/ipfs/bafybeibwsu2wgzmeyqfxdn5zzsqfw4kkqmda7gx2hop2sdhtnajeasozxm/)](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=orlandobello/tnhgcgzp) ‚ñ∂Ô∏è [Watch on 3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=orlandobello/tnhgcgzp)
--- (Esta es una publicaci√≥n biling√ºe. La versi√≥n en castellano est√° al final del post)
Greetings, community of musicians and music lovers This is my third participation in this magnificent Festival, after a long season without being able to publish due to fortuitous circumstances. I am happy to return and I appreciate the support that my friends from "Venezuelan Power" (Name devised by @fernanblog) gave me for the making of this video: @barbyjr Recording @elioe Setting @hermaryrc Lighting and choirs @sayury Guitar, lead vocals, post publication I participate as a percussionist. My team is a Christmas drum, a cymbal and - above all - great desire to make music. My passion and my joy! For this, my third meeting with you, I selected the song "Un Gato En La Oscuridad" (A Cat In The Darkness) a song that was popularized several decades ago by the Brazilian vocalist Roberto Carlos. It is a song that is among my favorites for its rhythm, its beautiful melody and its romantic and poetic lyrics. In one of the photos that accompany this publication you will see a tabby cat. It's "Catire", @barbyjr's pet.
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmbY47AD6Aj8cLLGvAAcfCWwJG8dHhUY4EyMggrDSMi33Q/inshot_20231125_055300678.jpg)

"Catire" (Blonde) is a kitten who is not like the one in the song "sad and blue" but proud and with its white and yellow stripes it walks around our house looking at us with an air of superiority and sometimes with disgust when instead of buying the imported catfood- which fascinates it - it finds economical catfood on its plate - which it leaves on the plate -. I hope that my rhythmic interpretation of this beautiful song with the support of my friends be to your liking.
![325339110_1207845740143882_3394016779554725869_n.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/orlandobello/23vsWm258JVn4ELTVb13LVo42nws8TEyQtbJEc2eHpTShp4QMWV7byQw1CinuWhMwkrhk.png)


Versi√≥n en castellano


>Saludos, comunidad de m√∫sicos y amantes de la musica >Esta es mi primera participaci√≥n en este magn√≠fico Festival, luego de una larga temporada sin poder publicar debido a circunstancias fortuitas. Estoy feliz de regresar y agradezco el apoyo que me dieron mis amigos de "Venezuelan Power" (Nombre ideado por @fernanblog) para la realizaci√≥n de este video: >@barbyjr Grabaci√≥n @elioe Ambientaci√≥n @hermaryrc Iluminaci√≥n y coros @sayury Guitarra, voz principal, publicaci√≥n del post --- >Participo como percusionista. Mi equipo es un tambor de parranda navide√±a, un platillo y - sobre todo - grandes deseos de hacer m√∫sica ¬°Mi pasi√≥n y mi alegr√≠a! >Para este, mi tercer encuentro con ustedes, seleccion√© el tema "Un Gato En La Oscuridad", canci√≥n que fuera popularizada hace varias d√©cadas por el vocalista brasile√±o Roberto Carlos. Es una canci√≥n que se cuenta entre mis favoritas por su r√≠tmica, su bella melod√≠a y su rom√°ntica y po√©tica letra. >Les brindo cono un obsequio la interpretaci√≥n original en la voz de Roberto Carlos, a la vez les invito a escuchar otros temas de √©l, ya que cada una de sus canciones tiene una magia especial.
https://youtu.be/jEfJy5rQ-uA?si=Pn-XxA_fysm15KoI

>En una de las fotos que acompa√±an est√° publicaci√≥n ver√°n un gato atigrado. Es "Catire", la mascota de @barbyjr.
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmbY47AD6Aj8cLLGvAAcfCWwJG8dHhUY4EyMggrDSMi33Q/inshot_20231125_055300678.jpg)

>Catire es un minino que se las trae, no es como el de la canci√≥n "triste y azul" sino orgulloso y con sus rayas blancas y amarillas se pasea por la casa mir√°ndonos con aire de superioridad y a veces con disgusto cuando en lugar de comprarle la gatarina importada - que le fascina - encuentra en su platito gatarina econ√≥mica - que en el plato la deja -. >Espero que mi interpretaci√≥n r√≠tmica de esta hermosa canci√≥n con el apoyo de mus amigos sea de su agrado.
![325339110_1207845740143882_3394016779554725869_n.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/orlandobello/23vsWm258JVn4ELTVb13LVo42nws8TEyQtbJEc2eHpTShp4QMWV7byQw1CinuWhMwkrhk.png)

"Earn some small money by doing advertising and follow @advertisingbot2"
>"Gana algo de dinero haciendo publicidad y sigue a @advertisingbot2"

Fotos y v√≠deos de mi propiedad, tomados con tel√©fono celular LGK42
All photos and video are my own, captured with LGK42 phone.
Edici√≥n: Inshot
Edition: Inshot
Texto en castellano elaborado sin IA
The text in Spanish was created without AI The text translated with [Traductor Google](https://www.google.com/search?client=firefox-b-e&q=traductor+espa%C3%B1ol+a+ingles)

Integrantes de la Agrupaci√≤n Musical ‚ÄúVenezuelan Power‚Äù (Nombre ideado por@fernanblog)/ Members of the Musical Group "Venezuelan Power" (Name devised by @fernanblog)
https://images.ecency.com/DQmfN96xTkj1voH3mnZqN1vbX4Cvr7WjtyMTNbe5zwUgvqN/todos.png

https://images.ecency.com/DQmQ6iy8E9MYDjn7bM6T2PfRMR6YdMgyMPjdTU5MJhKUTrC/firma_orlando.png
‚ñ∂Ô∏è [3Speak](https://3speak.tv/watch?v=orlandobello/tnhgcgzp)

author: advertisingbot2
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising contest for week 47 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2023-11-24 to 2023-11-30.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![Task_and_Rules.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKe5wHrNamDx6RNtvzvqhB4qwg2qhZTGoEtwSPhfsuwSEJhTjSajgbDFC77j8pa.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Earn some small money by doing advertising and follow @advertisingbot2"**

![optional.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKtSxwA38nJdyUdmvhncNmy6tW8CtYvXAw982Fh8BvMuxYgstc1eESWrwkNtsYn.png)

> The account @advertisingbot2 creates regular contests. Every person with a Hive account can join by writing a post with advertising text included. The users usually get 2 Hive for these actions.
Sponsors can create these advertising contests by just filling out a form and sending the budget to @advertisingbot2. The rest of the budget will be sent back to the sponsor. 
This advertisingprocess works, but is still at the beginning (betaphase).


# The Reward

The first 10 Hive users, that do this, will get 2 Hive each.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaing-23111701
https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-marketing-campaing-23111001
https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-advertising-contest-from-last-week


![About.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AK299d4UG9ZMVqmPCk4bNmimT7nsX7e97oF5X92S4LFjZbapekr19HWa8BGonQF.png)

# Status of this project

This week I worked on the automatic creation of a campaing, based on a template. I only need to change the following parameters: 
```
const budget = 20 // Hive
const reward = 2 // Hive per participant
const maxAdvertisers = budget/reward
const advertisingText = 'follow @fjworld and visit https://epaytraffic.com/'
const sponsor = '@achimmertens';
```

With this, the campaign-Text is created automatically.

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)

*[origin of some images](https://photofunia.com/)*
